messages.content: Maria Miller and Theresa May standing up for Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working with local Councillors to campaign for more effective management of water quality in the River Loddon, improved equipment and processes.
Basingstoke has record levels of employment, with new jobs created here including quality apprenticeships.
Support for Basing View, infrastructure improvements, creating a great place for work.
Help to buy and shared ownership schemes to make house ownership accessible to more families in Basingstoke.
Plans for a new A&E Department, new GP Surgery, Fire Station, and improved infrastructure.
Securing improvements for local healthcare facilities and services, especially at the new Rooksdown Surgery.

issues.brexitEurope: I believe we must look to the future and get the best possible deal for Britain.
issues.environment: Protecting Our Environment: Working on water quality improvement in the River Loddon.
issues.health: Safeguarding the NHS: Securing local healthcare improvements at Rooksdown Surgery.
issues.labourEmployment: Basingstoke has record levels of employment with new jobs and apprenticeships.

community.content: Support for Basing View with upgraded roads and infrastructure.

politicalExperience.achievements: Chair of Parliament's Women and Equalities Committee, supporting local charity, backing transparency for military personnel.

contactInformation.address: Basingstoke Conservatives, Unit 5, The Mall, Basingstoke, Hampshire RG21 7QU

endorsements.endorsement: Maria is known and respected for getting things done, both nationally and locally.

quotes.text: Maria is known and respected for getting things done, both nationally and locally.

examples: Basingstoke has record levels of employment.
Maria Miller has been your hard-working MP for 12 years.
I believe we must look to the future and get the best possible deal for Britain.
Support for Basing View with upgraded roads and infrastructure.
Support for Basing View with upgraded roads and infrastructure.
More Affordable Homes: Help to buy and shared ownership schemes.
Services Basingstoke Needs: Plans for a new A&E Department and GP Surgery.
I believe we must look to the future and get the best possible deal for Britain.

personalStories.story: Maria is a working mum who lives with her husband Iain and their children in Basingstoke.

examples: Maria is known and respected for getting things done, both nationally and locally. - Borough Councillor Terri Reid
